Package io.dimeformat

Class ItemLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dimeformat.ItemLink
  • public final class ItemLink
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a link to a Dime item. This can be used to link Dime items together, which then would be signed and thus create a cryptographic relationship.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.lang.String cryptoSuiteName
      The cryptographic suite used to generate the item link.
      java.lang.String itemIdentifier
      The item identifier, this is used to determine the Dime item type, i.e.
      java.lang.String thumbprint
      The thumbprint of the linked item.
      java.util.UUID uniqueId
      The unique ID of the linked item.

    • Field Detail

      • itemIdentifier

        public final java.lang.String itemIdentifier
        The item identifier, this is used to determine the Dime item type, i.e. "ID", "MSG", etc.

      • thumbprint

        public final java.lang.String thumbprint
        The thumbprint of the linked item. Used to determine if an item is the linked item.

      • uniqueId

        public final java.util.UUID uniqueId
        The unique ID of the linked item.

      • cryptoSuiteName

        public java.lang.String cryptoSuiteName
        The cryptographic suite used to generate the item link.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemLink

        public ItemLink​(Item item)
        Creates an item link from the provided DiME item.
        Parameters:
        item - The DiME item to create the item link from.

      • ItemLink

        public ItemLink​(Item item,
                java.lang.String cryptoSuiteName)
        Creates an item link from the provided DiME item.
        Parameters:
        item - The DiME item to create the item link from.
        cryptoSuiteName - The name of the cryptographic suite to use, may be null.

      • ItemLink

        public ItemLink​(java.lang.String itemIdentifier,
                java.lang.String thumbprint,
                java.util.UUID uniqueId,
                java.lang.String cryptoSuiteName)
        Creates an item link from the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifier - The Dime item identifier of the item, e.g. "ID", "MSG", etc.
        thumbprint - The thumbprint of the item to which the link should be created.
        uniqueId - The unique ID of the item to which the link should be created.
        cryptoSuiteName - The name of the cryptographic suite used.

                            throws InvalidFormatException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Decoded ItemLink instance.
        Throws:

      • fromEncodedList

        public static java.util.List<ItemLink> fromEncodedList​(java.lang.String encodedList)
                                                throws InvalidFormatException
        Returns a list of ItemLink instances from an encoded string.
        Parameters:
        encodedList - The encoded string.
        Returns:
        Decoded ItemLink instances in a list.
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - If unable to decode the provided string.

      • verify

        public boolean verify​(Item item)
        Verifies if an item corresponds to the ItemLink.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to verify against.
        Returns:
        True if verified successfully.

      • verify

        public static IntegrityState verify​(java.util.List<Item> items,
                                    java.util.List<ItemLink> links)
        Verifies a list of items towards a list of ItemLink instances.
        Parameters:
        items - The items to verify against.
        links - The list of ItemLink instances.
        Returns:
        The state of the integrity verification.
